properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: hyperlinkSource
parameters.description: The hyperlinked object. Can accept: HyperlinkPageItemSource, HyperlinkTextSource or CrossReferenceSource.

parameters.name: hyperlinkDestination
parameters.description: The destination that the hyperlink points to. Can accept: Ordered array containing fileName:String, volumn:String, directoryId:Long Integer, dataLinkClassId:Long Integer, destinationUid:Long Integer, HyperlinkTextDestination, HyperlinkPageDestination, HyperlinkExternalPageDestination, HyperlinkURLDestination or ParagraphDestination. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new Hyperlink (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the Hyperlink.

methods.name: item

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified index or name.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the Hyperlink with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The Hyperlink, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Hyperlink, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The Hyperlink, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Hyperlink, Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the Hyperlinks within the specified range.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the Hyperlink that follows the desired Hyperlink.

methods.description: Returns the Hyperlink with the index previous to the specified index.

methods.name: nextItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The Hyperlink whose index comes before the desired Hyperlink.

methods.description: Returns the Hyperlink whose index follows the specified Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every Hyperlink in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Hyperlink.
Returns the Hyperlink with the specified index.
